animeTitle: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! 2: Kono Subarashii Geijutsu ni Shukufuku wo! (Dub)
otherNames: KonoSuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World! 2 - God's Blessing on This Wonderful Art!, Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! 2 OVA, この素晴らしい世界に祝福を！2 この素晴らしい芸術に祝福を！
synopsis: Kazuma meets a novice adventurer called Ran who claims to be Kazuma's fan. A quest is proposed to Kazuma and his party in front of Ran, so he accepts the quest to look good in front of his fan; after some convincing, they all go to fight the metal golem.
